summary: Python is a great language for text processing.  Each new version of Python--but especially the 3.x series--has enhanced this strength of the language. String (and byte) objects have grown some handy methods and some built-in functions have improved or been added.  More importantly, refinements and additions have been made to the standard library to cover  the most common tasks in text processing.
title: Why you should use Python 3 for text processing
